name: The Zombie Game
description:
This is just an Alpha of 'The Zombie Game,' I know there are a lot of bugs and some missing features. This project is only an experimentation of my abilities as a programmer. There is a lot more for me to learn.

Controls:

W - move forward

A - move left

S - move back

D - more right

Weapon Controls:

Left Mouse button - fire gun

Character:

This is Ray, a veteran from a war that everyone has heard of! He served his 6 years in the military, and is now living in a spooky neighborhood where zombies are heard to appear.....weird noises have been heard in an underground room and Ray is called to investigate...will he and his trusty AK-47 be tested or is it just a false alarm.....

Download

To actually play the game, all you need to do is to  download the zip file. Then unzip it and use the Zomboo Shooter.exe to play the game. Have fun ^_^

But when you do find any bugs feel free to email me. My email address is in the ReadMe file.
